Ston Kosmo Se Dio Trochus Greece (transliterated ISO-LATIN-1 title)
World Bikers: Laurie Moto Club World-wide (English title) (informal English title)
akas from release info: Στον Κόσμο Σε Δυο Τροχούς Greece
Ston Kosmo Se Dio Trochus Greece (transliterated ISO-LATIN-1 title)
World Bikers: Laurie Moto Club World-wide (English title) (informal English title)

1.title: Bonnie N' Laurie
1.plot: For Laurie's next destination in the UK, a straight-from-the-factory Triumph Bonneville T100 will take her in a thrilling, white-knuckle rider's adventure at Isle of Man's Tourist Trophy, of course, under the capricious British weather.

2.title: L'Âme Guzzi
2.plot: Down the roads of Lombardy, Laurie's fancy chrome-plated Moto Guzzi V7 Racer makes heads turn, but later on, at the picturesque village of Mandello del Lario, she will discover firsthand the brand's untamed soul.

3.title: Dans La Roue Du Che
3.plot: On her first ride to Latin America, Laurie will follow the iconic route of the revolutionary Ernesto "Che" Guevara during the 1500km from Buenos Aires to Córdoba, and from there, to Rosario, Che's birthplace.

1.title: Ural Infernal
1.plot: Laurie's mission to discover the most renowned bikes across the world begins from Moscow on the seat of a tough Ural sidecar motorcycle.

2.title: Harley, Mon Amour
2.plot: In Milwaukee, Laurie's first stop is the temple of Harley-Davidson riding her Softail Heritage on a road trip across the Midwestern United States from Lake Michigan to Saint Louis.

3.title: Royal Rajasthan
3.plot: Laurie's Indian odyssey in the land of the Maharajahs begins on the saddle of a modern classic Bullet 350cc, between the Thar Desert and the Jaisalmer Fort in Rajasthan.

imdb.plot outline: Since the age of fifteen, Laurie Bernard from Brittany has been entirely crazy about bikes. As a true motorcycle aficionado, her dream is to meet those who travel around the world on their two wheels: the bikers. As we join Laurie in her amazing adventure to the four corners of the earth, we get the chance to discover the world again through an invigoratingly fresh perspective, on a journey from Russia to the United States and India, and from the United Kingdom to Italy and Argentina. In each country, Laurie will be riding an exceptional motorcycle that is, without a doubt, a true national monument, while sharing with us the intimate stories of the passionate riders who wholeheartedly contributed in the making of legends. As soon as the engine starts, unexpected encounters and various mechanical incidents will spice up Laurie's exciting and daring feat--but in the end--all that remains is the alluring charm of the road.
imdb.title: Laurie Moto Club
plot: From Russia to India and Argentina, and from the legendary Route 66 to the United Kingdom and Italy, the journey is always better on two wheels.::Nick Riganas

Since the age of fifteen, Laurie Bernard from Brittany has been entirely crazy about bikes. As a true motorcycle aficionado, her dream is to meet those who travel around the world on their two wheels: the bikers. As we join Laurie in her amazing adventure to the four corners of the earth, we get the chance to discover the world again through an invigoratingly fresh perspective, on a journey from Russia to the United States and India, and from the United Kingdom to Italy and Argentina. In each country, Laurie will be riding an exceptional motorcycle that is, without a doubt, a true national monument, while sharing with us the intimate stories of the passionate riders who wholeheartedly contributed in the making of legends. As soon as the engine starts, unexpected encounters and various mechanical incidents will spice up Laurie's exciting and daring feat--but in the end--all that remains is the alluring charm of the road.::Nick Riganas
